SENT.plain: Description of the Klippel-TrÃ©naunay-Syndrome; it could have been sporadic found in a 3; 6-year-old girl
This congenital anomaly is characterized by haemangiomatosis, varicosis and unilateral hypertrophia of limbs
As a rule the therapy is a symptomatic one, surgical operations concerning the skeleton are infrequent
